steps.name: AND the web page has loaded
AND the table is present on the page

parameters.name: Table data:
parameters.value:
ID First Name Last Name Age City
1 Jon Snow 14 Castle Black
2 Arya Stark 9 Winterfell
3 Tyrion Lannister 25 Casterly Rock
4 Oberyn Martell 42 Sunspear
5 Daenerys Targaryen 16 Dragonstone
6 Brandon Stark 8 Winterfell

steps.name: WHEN the 'City' header is found in a table without a <thead>
THEN the column index should be 5
